chinese: 營營青蠅、止于樊。豈弟君子、無信讒言。
english: They buzz about, the blue flies,Lighting on the fences.O happy and courteous sovereign,Do not believe slanderous speeches.

chinese: 營營青蠅、止于棘。讒人罔機、交亂四國。
english: They buzz about, the blue flies,Lighting on the jujube trees.The slanderers observe no limits,And throw the whole kingdom into confusion.

chinese: 營營青蠅、止于榛。讒人罔機、構我二人。
english: They buzz about, the blue flies,Lighting on the hazel trees.The slanderers observe no limits,And set us two at variance.
